items.title: 9 Amazing Golf Courses in the Caribbean and Bermuda
items.cover: https://img.oyster.com/production/Articles/9 Amazing Golf Courses in the Caribbean and Bermuda/Feature/9_Amazing_Golf_Courses_in_the_Caribbean_and_Bermuda_feature_image_f25aa0aa10.jpeg
items.excerpt: From Punta Cana in the Dominican Republic to Ocho Rios in Jamaica , the Caribbean and nearby Bermuda are full of fantastic travel destinations. The warm weather, white-sand beaches, and luxurious resorts may be what the islands are best known for, but they also have some of thâ€¦
